thread.title: Man is FOURTH person to undergo multiple organ transplant
thread.title_full: Man is FOURTH person to undergo multiple organ transplant

title: Man is FOURTH person to undergo multiple organ transplant
text: 'I was dying - this was my last chance': Man, 37, set to marry his fiance after undergoing 17-hour multiple organ transplant to beat cancer Adam Alderson was diagnosed with peritoneal cancer, pseudomyxoma peritonei The 37 year-old, from north Yorkshire, was told he was just weeks from death Underwent 17-hour surgery which required 30 people to remove 10kg tumour Surgeons worked shifts as they removed his stomach, small bowel, large bowel, pancreas, spleen, gall bladder, appendix, abdominal wall and most of his liver He then had multiple abdominal organs transplanted into him Now getting married to his fiance Laura, who stood by him throughout Published: 15:23 GMT, 28 February 2017 | Updated: 16:35 GMT, 28 February 2017 7 shares
